title: Emergency road closure in Lower Gornal
content:
A LOWER Gornal road has been closed while a water leak is repaired. 
 
Bull Street is expected to be shut until Sunday (September 6) from its junctions with Louise Street and Himley Road. 
   
 Share article  
   
Access will be maintained from the Himley Road end where it is safe to do so. 
 
Traffic will be diverted via Louise Street, Summit Place, Himley Road and vice versa.
